name: genetic-sequence
title: GeneticSequence
description: A genetic sequence in either a physical or digital manifestation.

fields.name: geneticSequenceID
fields.description: An identifier for a genetic sequence.

fields.name: sourceMaterialEntityID
fields.description: A unique identifier for an instance of MaterialEntity that was the source of this GeneticSequence.

fields.name: geneticSequenceType
fields.description: The category that best matches the nature of the GeneticSequence.
fields.comments: Recommended best practice is to use a controlled vocabulary.

fields.name: geneticSequence
fields.description: A string representing nucleotide base pairs.

fields.name: geneticSequenceCitation
fields.description: A list (concatenated and separated) of identifiers (publication, bibliographic reference, global unique identifier, URI) of literature associated with the GeneticSequence.
fields.comments: Recommended best practice is to separate the values in a list with space vertical bar space (` | `).

fields.name: geneticSequenceRemarks
fields.description: Comments or notes about the GeneticSequence.
